description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
description.en: This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹window 作業系統之基本操作技巧，word 文書處理軟體、Excel計算表軟體及Power Point 簡報軟體製作之 基本應用。
description.en: The course introduces the basic operating skills of the window system and the application software such as word processors (MS WORD) spreadsheet calculators (Excel) and the prestation media (Power Point ).

description.zh: 本課程內容包括控制閥、控制器之介紹，程序動態應答分析，閉還路控制系統分析，控制器調諧，頻率應答分析及串級控制系統之介紹
description.en: This course contents the introduction of control valve and controller, process dynamics, close loop control system, tuning of feedback controller, frequency response techniques, and cascade control system.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 介紹高分子物理、化學及光電等性質，並且回顧及展望高分子在生化、醫學及光電產業的應用。1. 高分子物理及化學性質2. 高分子光電特性3. 功能性高分子4. 液晶高分子5. 薄膜技術與應用6. 生醫材料及高分子藥物7. 高分子導體及半導體8. 光電用高分子9. 高分子電池10. 高分子LED
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles and applications of polymers. It covers the following topics: physical and chemical properties; electrical and optical characterizations; functional polymers; liquid crystalline polymers; membranes; biomaterials; polymers for photonic and electronics; conductive and semi-conductive polymers; polymers for batteries; and polymeric LED.

description.zh: 介紹如何解決環境汙染之防治技術，依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同汙染源，分別探討解決空污、水污、土壤污染、噪音以及熱污染防治，內容包括有關環境工程之單元操作及設計，生物反應器之組合，操作及用途介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmental pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

description.zh: 教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制,準確度等。內容有紅、可見、紫外、X光 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如  、液體層析等。
description.en: This text will introduce the fundamental principles and  Applications of modern Analytical instruments.Measuring devices, limitations of measurements in terms of sensitivity and accuracy will also be taught. The contents are infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-ray and nuclear magnetic spectroscopes, Analysis of sur-faces with electron beams and mass spectrometry, thermal methods and chromatography and related separation methods.

description.zh: 內容包括高分子聚合反應，高分子結構及其物理性質。並包含高分子物性的鑑定及高分子流變學和加工。另就橡膠、塑膠、纖維，由結構、性質、用途、產品，做比較和說明。
description.en: A major objective of this course is to provide a background in polymerizations, polymer structures and polymer properties. The material in this course also covers polymer characterization,polymer rheology and polymer processing. In addition , tructures, properties, usages and products of rubbers, plastics and fibers are emphasized and compared.

description.zh: 本課程主要簡介紡織科技所包含之原料,製程,製品和評估，同時訓練學生了解基本的紡織辭彙。
description.en: Textile materials and related processes are introduced, and technical used  are learned as well.

description.zh: 染料發色理論，染料類別與性質，染料中間體，偶氮染料之製備以及分散、反應、直接等染料之結構與性質之介紹與說明。
description.en: It covers the chromophores. Colour Index intermediates and properties of different kinds of dyes.  The details of preparention of azo dyes,disperse dyes and reactive dyes and also described.

description.zh: 本課程乃針對紡絲過程中，無論在熔融紡絲、溼式紡絲或乾式紡絲中，所遇到有關流力之問題，做一綜合性之整理。其主要內容包括：(1)理想流體(2)牛頓流體(3)Navier-Stokes公式導證(4)高黏度流體(5)邊界層流體(6)可壓縮流體(7)高分子黏彈體(8)擾流之概述。
description.en: This course is aimed at solving the fluid problems occurredin melt spinning,wet spinning,and dry spinning.With the knowledges in classical fluid mechanics,many problems associated with spinning can be solved.The main topics in this course includes(1)Ideal flow(2)Newtonian Fluid(3)Navier-stokes equation   (4)High viscouse fluid(5)Boundary layer flow(6)Incompressible fluid (7)Polymer rheology(8) Turbulent fluid.

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 互動設計專注於使用情境相關課題，包括多元感覺的產品語意、資訊與功能的整體設計。顧及使用者的需求、使用者的心理和使用者的認知特性；將所有參與互動的操作及顯示單元，透過視覺、觸覺及聽覺等多元感覺的整合設計。使得使用者容易理解。
description.en: This course provides study of interaction design related topics on Product Semantics, Information and Function. With emphasis on User Interface integration and Usability Testing, psychology and cognitive proactive, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary on multi-median. This is where the user easy understanding applies and interacts with the product.

description.zh: 從現代人之生活習慣及家庭組織去探討人與家具之關係，並隨材料科技和加工技術的進步，研究現代家具的趨勢及設計方向。
description.en: A general study of design trend of contemporary furniture by respectively examining modern lifestyle and family construction. This study intends to utilize material improvement, new manufacturing technology and ergonomics studies as the derivation of design innovation.

description.zh: 本課程內容涵蓋視覺傳達、產品、建築及都市等涉及智慧居住、智慧辦公、公共建築、公共設計、燈光設計、人因互動、空間再造等特殊環境設計相關課題。
description.en: The subject can be found discovered in many fields, which include plane, product, architecture, public design , interaction design and urban environmental design...  etc. areas.

name.en: Study of Design Thoughts and Movements

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計史、設計理論與設計評論等主題之碩士論文研究，與實務專題設計之創作理念與風格的理論探討，提供總體觀照設計思潮所需之理論縱深與歷史距離。課程內容以多元辨證方式，針對(1)各種設計思想與運動：現代主義與後現代主義、結構主義與後結構主義、資本主義與社會主義等，以及(2)各派設計論述：行為派、系統派、認知派、語言派、歷史派、社會派等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help graduate students to prepare their master's theses that are related to design history, theories and criticism, or to review related design concepts and styles for their graduate projects. This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

description.zh: 如何將材料創造出強度更高，延伸率，斷面收縮率，衝整值等耐強度更大之材料，除了調整合金元素外，如何應用熱處理之手段使材料達到所求之特性。對於各種熱處理之原理、解析及實際的應用作詳盡的介紹。隨著科技之發達，機械工業之進步、構造物之增大及精密化、迷你化之趨勢，金屬材料所要求之性質需要更進一步之強化，為滿足此一要求，除調整合金元素之外，必須賴適當的熱處理，才能發揮材料本身含有合金元素之功能，亦可滿足吾人所需之各種用途，本課程為使學生瞭解這些處理方法，由理論上說明熱處理與變態理論，及熱處理對強化機構上之理論根據，及熱處理之方法等，本熱處理課程內容有：1.金屬熱處理之基礎，各種組織與變態，平衡圖在熱處理上之應用，連續冷卻，恆溫冷卻，在熱處理之應用、鋼之淬火變態舉動，合金元素在材料上之影響，結晶粒之大小性質對熱處理之影響，鋼之硬化能之應用及計算方法。2.熱處理技術、鋼之加熱及各種熱處理方法。3.鋼之光輝熱處理，保護爐氣之種類及其管理方法。4.鋼之表面硬化熱處理。5.淬火零件之設計及材料之選擇。6.工具模具鋼、不銹鋼、鑄鐵、銅及鋁合金之熱處理。7.熱處理發生不良原因及其防止方法。
description.en: How to create a higher strength, elongation, percentage of area reduction, impactvalue material, except for adjusting alloy elements, it also utilizes heat treatmentmethod to achieve the property. Pinpoint to the theory ,analysis,practical applicaton of all kinds of heat treatment,,it would be detailly introduced by this course.

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microsope,the theories of forming image and diffraction, the applications of material science. The course contents include the transmission electron microscope structure,the electronic magnetic lens and image formation theory, electronic diffraction theory, diffraction diagram analysis, and the making of test sample, the structure and forming image principle of a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS.

description.zh: 1. 緒論、2. 負載預測、3. 發電系統可靠度分析、4. 發電成本分析、5. 電力潮流計算與分析、6. 輸電系統可靠度分析、7. 自動化輸電系統擴展性規劃、8. 電力系統故障分析
description.en: The purpose of this course is to focus attention on 1. the overall process called power system planning and 2. the mathematical detail of various analytical tools. The nature of this course makes it a graduate-level lecture and it is opened for those who already have a basic understanding on power system.1. Introduction, 2.Load Forecasting, 3.Generation System Reliability Analysis, 4.Generation System Cost Analysis, 5.Power Flow computation and Analysis, 6.Transmission System Reliability Analysis, 7.Automated Transmission System Expansion Planning, 8.Faulty Analysis of Power System.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 介紹計算機基本架構，硬體，軟體，程式設計，Algorithms及組合語言程式。
description.en: This course will focus on: basic structure of computer; applied; software﹝Office97, Lotus123…﹞; program design; algorithms and visual basic program.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意聲學之性質，噪音對人類之影響，音源及音場，噪音量測及分析設備，聲音之量測，噪音位準、標準及規範，音響材料及結構，噪音控制之原理。
description.en: The Nature of Sound, Effects of Noise on People, Sound Source and Sound Fields, Instrumentation for Measurement and Analysis of Noise, Acoustical Measurements, Noise Criteria, Standards and Regulations, Acoustical Materials and Structures, Principles of Noise Control.

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動必須結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於生產自動化及企業電子化之相關知識以及進行製商整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore ,  the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for manufacturing automation and electronic business.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section will introduce the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future. The second section, the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analyses of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section-the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing and internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 透過講課、討論、專題報告的方式，瞭解投資的擬定、報酬與風險分析、執行與評估方法，並探討不同因素對投資之影響，期提供良好的投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment, return and risk analysis, investment execution and evaluation methods. Various factors that affect the investment decision problems are discussed to help decision-maker properly resolves investment decision-making.

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格 2.企業環境的偵察 3.策略形成 4.策略執行與評估 5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function involved in management. The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning. The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 結合工作衡量之基礎及人事管理之應用，並使用工業工程之基本管理知識，使學生瞭解績效管理之概念、程序、方法及步驟，達成最終提昇工作績效之目地。
description.en: Combining the work measurement and personnel management applications to make the students realize the concept、procedure、methods of performance management. To improve performance of work is the target of this course.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 本課程在教授學習者能熟悉Dreamweaver的功能，如何建構網站、製作網頁、使用Dreamweaver  的操作環境採用圖形界面處理畫面，並搭配HTML原始碼便可自動產生，此軟體同時可以即時交互編輯修改，編輯文字、插入分隔線、表格製作、超連結、圖形編輯、圖層應用等功能，輕鬆便可產生一般與動態的網頁，整合網頁以及網頁特效設計，甚至包含程式組等多樣式網頁型態。透過此課程學習者能使用此軟體不僅製作一個基本的商業網站，更可以匯入多樣的動態媒體，增加網站內容的互動性與豐富性。1.基本網路技術2.網路資料管理技術3.管理資訊系統技術4.網路管理資訊系統計樹5.分散式資料管理技術6.群體決策支援系統技術7.網路技術在高階主管資訊系統的應用
description.en: The course is for the designation of commercial web site. Learning how to build up the commercial website.with Dreamweaver

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理簡介、快速原型系統簡介、Solid Model建立、3D實體建構、快速模具簡介、快速原型技術應用簡介。
description.en: Introduction to principle of rapid prototyping, Introduction to System of rapid prototyping, Building of Solid model, Building of 3D parts, Introduction to rapidtooling, Introduction to applications of rapid prototyping technology.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分微積分與最佳化之關係及其在工程最佳化上之應用、端點條件、不連續最佳化程序、無限制及有限制條件最佳化問題、直接法及實際最佳化設計應用等。
description.en: Introduction of Variational Calculus and its Application in the Engineering Optimal Design, Constrained/Unconstrained Optimal Design Problems, Discrete Optimal Control and Mathematical Programming, Practical Examples of Optimum Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。系統匯流排（匯流排之時序、匯流排之負載及驅動能力）、序列系統介面（8251可程式通信介面）、平行系統介面（8251可式程式週邊介面）、A/D &D/A 介面、系統中斷 DMA(Direct Memory Access)介面 、通訊訊號介面（RS232、RS422、電流迴路）、區域性網路（區域性網路概論、區域性網路的使用方法、區域性網路方式及目的）、區域性網路的基礎技術、通訊線路及信號、資料交換規則、匯流排網路的特性及分析。
description.en: System Bus (Bus Timing, Bus Loading, Bus Driven), Serial Communication Interfaces (8251 Programmable Communication Interfaces), Parallel Communication (8255 Programmable Peripheral Interface), A/D & D/A Interface, Interrupt System, Direct Memory Access Controllers Communication Interface (RS232, RS422, Current Loop), Local Networks (Introduction of Networks Technology, Communication Circuit and Signals, Data Switching Techniques, Network Performance & Analysis).

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 台灣經濟的發展已帶動了政治民主化的發展，尤其自解嚴後，政治社會全面變遷，改變幅度之大與範圍之廣，變化之快速與轉變之激烈，予人一種眼花撩亂，目不暇給之感。身為明日舞台的主人，要不被社會拖著走，唯有洞察、掌握社會變遷脈動的能力。本課程將以學術理論為你深入分析、客觀探討。
description.en: The economic development in Taiwan resulted in the rapid development in political spheres. Especially after the lifting of the martial law, the changes in politics and society have exerted a great impact.  This course will provide students with the ability to keep track of the changes of the society.  Based on political theories, students will learn how to investigate the phenomena and analyze the reasons of these changes.

description.zh: 克希荷夫定律(KCL, KVL)及綱目電流法、節點電位法及重疊定律、載維寧定律等之電路計算技巧應用；RLC電路之一階、二階電路之暫態自然響應及相量式之於弦波函數穩態分析。
description.en: Some useful tchniques of circuit analysis in mesh current method, nodal analysis, superposition principle and thevenin's theorems and so on; the first order and second order equation for natural response in RLC circuits and phasor concept to forced response in sinusoidal steady-state equation.

description.zh: 21世紀是知識經濟的時代，唯有知識是個人及組織(含企業及國家)持續成長的核心能力，工科研究所以上的學生除了要具備技術面臨新經濟的挑戰外，也應對本科技術外的各種知識領域深入瞭解，並能予以駕馭，即時掌握時機發揮智慧的潛力，開創成功的事業及美好的人生。其課程內容含指：1.基本原理(新經濟模型)2.新經濟的管理理論3.辦認新經濟潛力4.降低不確定性5.動態競爭分析6.生產力分析7.技術智慧資本8.新興經濟體的創新9.專技人員自我管理。
description.en: The power of knowledge is the only core-competence for both individuals and organizations )include：enterprise and country) to maintain continuing growth during the coming 21st century-the ERA of knowledge economy.For the graduated students in engineering school, the program of knowledge economy management bring them new concept and lead them to keep and handle any opportunity to approach their life goal and to deal with their future carrier planning. The program include：1.fundamentals (models of knowledge) 2.theories of knowledge economy 3.recognizing the potential of knowledge economy 1.reducing uncertainty 5.dynamic competitive 6.productivity analysis 7.technical intelligence capital 8.innovation of Emerging Economies 9.knowledge worker's self-management.

description.zh: 建築物理環境控制包含被動式(passive)控制與主動式(active)控制，本課程之教學目標在於提供建築設備、建築設計與土木營造工程學習者，認識建築物理環境主動式控制設備之內容系統特性、空間規劃、使用管理、設計方法，以及從生態建築設備科技的觀點出發，探討建築計畫與冷凍空調、電機、機械等環境控制設備介面間之整合與最佳化課題，以培育具有更宏觀、更前瞻、更專業與更高的建築、環境控制與設備的溝通與整合能力。本程共有六個建築設備主題：(一)生態建築設備科技概論、(二)空氣調節設備、(三)給排水衛生設備、(四)防災設備、(五)電氣設備、(六)輸送設備。經由本課程，培養學習者具有與建築師、專業設備工程師進行討論及提出需求想法之能力，並能閱讀設備系統圖及設備施工圖，同時加強學習者對於整體建築設備設計、系統整合與生態建築設備科技之體認，藉以提升設備工程、營建工程與建築設計品質，以及設施管理能力。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the technology of building environmental control systems and ecological building in the sense of integrated planning. This course offers encyclopedic coverage of fundamentals, rules of thumb, and detailed design procedures. This course emphasizes the concepts, system planning, facilities management, comparison of system costs and efficiencies, energy considerations, space requirements and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, electricity, water supply, plumping, fire protection, transportation and lighting into building's structure and design.

description.zh: 熱交換器應用、熱交換器設計簡介、熱傳分析、熱交換性能分析、熱交換器鰭片分析、熱交換器低溫應用分析
description.en: Applications of heat exchangers, introduction to heat exchanger design, heat transfer analysis, performance analysis of heat exchanger, analysis of heat exchanger fin design, analysis of low temperature applications

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 電機分析基本理論，基準座標原理，對稱感應機理論，同步電機理論，同步電機運轉阻抗及時間定數，感應機與同步機線性化運作方程式，同步機簡化運轉方程式，感應機與同步機平衡運作特性，感應機與同步機計算模擬。
description.en: principle of electric machine,d-q axis transformation,theory of symmetrical induction machines and synchronousmachines,linealization of induction and synchronous machineequations,modeling of induction and synchronous machines.

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別2. 物件導向與資料抽象化3. 類別與方法4. 訊息，實例與初始化5. 繼承6. 靜態與動態繫結7. 多型性8. 發展環境及工具9. 物件導向程式語言C++,Java,Smalltake簡介10.應用實例
description.en: 1. Programming Language Paradigms2. Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction3. Classes and Methods4. Messages,Instances,and Initialization5. Inheritance6. Static and Dynamic Binding7. Polymorphism8. Environment and Tools9. Introduction to C++,Java,and Smalltalk10.Case Study

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 1. 可程式控制器(PLC)概論2. PLC指令說明與應用3. PLC I/O介面4. A/D、D/A介面5. PLC與電腦連線6. 分散式控制系統7. 中小型PLC網路系統8. PLC選用9. PLC網路監控系統10. PLC應用實習5~7個

Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

description.zh: Z-轉換在數位控制之應用，取樣與訊號重整，狀態方程式，類比系統與數位系統之關係，穩定度分析，根值軌跡圖，時域下數位控制系統之控制器設計，頻域下數位控制系統之控制器設計，現代控制理論在數位系統之應用。
description.en: Course Title:Digital ControlDescription:To familiarize students with techniques of analyzingcomplex discrete-time systems in Time and Frequency domains. Toprovide students with the concepts and abilities of controller designfor complex discrete-time systems.

description.zh: 前言、DSP 架構、指令、定址法乘法加法、量化誤差、假信號FIR 濾波器、濾波器設計
description.en: IntroductionDSP architectureInstructionsAddressing modeMAC instructionsQuantization errorAliasingFIR filtersFilter design

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。

description.en: Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 通訊系統簡介，類比調變技術（AM，FM），脈波調變技術，數位調變技術。

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 通訊系統簡介，類比調變技術（AM，FM），脈波調變技術，數位調變技術。

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，其中包括：一因子實驗 ‧區集和拉丁方格 ‧不完全區集設計 ‧多因子實驗 ‧部份因子實驗 ‧巢狀或階層實驗 ‧變異數分析 ‧迴歸分析 ‧交互變異分析
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.zh: 懸吊系統型式、彈簧、避震器、轉向系統介紹、輪胎定位、懸吊機構和轉向機構之運動幾何、懸吊系統和轉向系統之力量分析。
description.en: Types of Suspension System, Springs, Dampers, Introduction to Steering System, Wheel Alignment, Kinematic Geometry of Suspension and Steering Mechanisms, Force Analysis of Suspension and Steering Systems.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一,著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明.課程大綱如下：1.解聯立方程式2.矩陣運算3.行列式4.向量空間5.線性轉換6.特徵值及特徵向量7.選擇性題材,視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法, Jordan form ,或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 邀請各界人士到系演講，針對學術專題研究成果進行研討，並就管理技術與發展趨勢以及成功個案等介紹不同行業的營運方式及競爭力分析。
description.en: Scholars and experts will be invited to make lectures; each lecture will focus on special attribution in the field which speaker involved.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 講授學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對購併相關議題有確實的瞭解，包括1.合併的動機與理論介紹，2.購併的型態與策略規畫，3.公司購併時的法律規畫4.美、日、歐金融控股公司發展與比較，5.美國與日本銀行購併案例之探討6.金融控股公司相關議題，7.合併後之相關整合規畫等
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding Mergers and Acquisitions. Topics are as follows: 1.Theory of M&A, 2.Types of M&A and Strategic Planning, 3.Legal Planning, 4. Types of FHC in the U.S., Japan, and Europe, 5.Case Study on M&A of Japanese Banks and U.S. Banks, 7.Topics on Financial Holding Companies, 8 .Integration after M&A.

description.zh: 1. 電力科技之改革2. 世界各國電力自由化發展3. 電力交換組織架構4. 獨立系統操作組織架構5. 電力庫制度6. 損失計算7. 電價計算
description.en: 1. Revolutions of power Technologies2. The development of deregulation in the world3. Organization of power exchange4. Organization of independent system operator5. power pool6. Power wheeling7. Calculations of losses8. Calculations of electric prices

description.zh: 介紹台灣地區近五百年以來之開發與變遷，其中歷經西班牙人、荷蘭人、明鄭、滿清以及日本等不同階段之治理，可就政治、經濟、社會、教育及文化等問題分別予以探討，特別是對中華民國政府遷台後之重大建設予以詳細論述，以便對整體台灣歷史之發展得有清晰之認識。
description.en: The course is to introduce the development and evolution of the Taiwan region in the past 500 years. The various stages of the reign by Hollanders, Spaniards, Cheng Ch'eng-kung, Manchurians, and Japanese will be discussed in relation to their politics, economics, social structures, educational systems, and cultural phenomena. The main focus is on the major construction under the reign of the Republic of China.

name.en: Analysis of the Historic Persons in Modern China

description.zh: 自國父鼓吹革命，以迄民國肇造，多少英雄豪傑活躍於歷史舞台上。對於這些時代人物的臧否、評價，實有進一步認識和了解的必要，以便在閱讀此段歷史之時，能作出正確而客觀的判斷。是以本課程擬就民國時期中，較具有關鍵且影響力較大的人物作一公正持平的介紹。此外，台灣在日據時期，亦有多位民主鬥士，不畏異族的高壓統治，竭盡所能，鼓吹新思想、倡導民主運動，其精神實在可佩，對於這些人物我們不可不知，自然亦在我們所要講授的範圍之內。
description.en: Since the revolution of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, many people have played important roles in Chinese history. They have had much influences in our country. It is essential for our students to have further knowledge about them, especiallt during the period of Japanese occupation in Taiwan. There were many people who didn't yield to Japanese control and promoted the democratic movement in Taiwan. They loved the land and tried their best to advocate new thought.In the course, we'll make detailed and accurate introductions about them. Fair understanding will make the students have objective comments about historic persons and the history of the period.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

description.zh: 講授應用於工程上之經濟分析及決策理論，並介紹報酬率、現值、及資金成本之計算與分析。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and applications of engineering economics in the process of marketing strategy. The nature of remuneration, capital, and depreciation will be introduced and calculated in case examples.
